{{Description|"In order to satisfy her appetite while maintaining a perfect figure and singing voice, Yun Jin developed a certain knack for cooking."|2=[[Dainsleif]] in [https://youtu.be/UJ7NrBAKtAA Collected Miscellany - "Yun Jin: Showstopper"]}}
'''Light Nourishment''' is [[Yun Jin]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If this talent activates while Yun Jin cooks [[Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup]], it is possible to double the amount of her special dish, [[Cloud-Shrouded Jade]].
